sentences: Ta ei ole veel alustanud kirjutama esseed.
context: The Estonian verb 'kirjutama' means 'to write'. It is an infinitive form of the verb and can be conjugated in various tenses. For example: kirjutan (I write), kirjutasin (I wrote), kirjutanud (have written). This is a common action verb used for writing texts, articles, letters, essays, and other written materials.
